      • signFile

        public CertificationChainAndSignatureBase64 signFile(java.io.File file,
                                            java.lang.String pkcs11LibraryFileName,
                                            java.lang.String pinCode)
                                              throws TopLevelException
        Signs given local file. The certificate and private key to be used for signing come from the locally attached smart card. The user is requested to provide a PKCS#11 implementation library and the PIN code for accessing the smart card.
        Specified by:
        signFile in interface PkiGeneric
        Parameters:
        aFileName - the name of the file to be signed.
        Returns:
        the digital signature of the given file and the certification chain of the certificatie used for signing the file, both Base64-encoded or null if the signing process is canceled by the user.
        Throws:
        DocumentSignException - when a problem arised during the singing process (e.g. smart card access problem, invalid certificate, invalid PIN code, etc.)
        TopLevelException

      • loadKeyStore

        public java.security.KeyStore loadKeyStore(java.lang.String aPKCS11LibraryFileName,
                                  java.lang.String aSmartCardPIN)
                                    throws TopLevelException
        Loads the keystore from the smart card using its PKCS#11 implementation library and the Sun PKCS#11 security provider. The PIN code for accessing the smart card is required.
        Specified by:
        loadKeyStore in interface PkiGeneric
        Throws:
        TopLevelException

      • getPrivateKeyAndCertChain

        public PrivateKeyAndCertChain getPrivateKeyAndCertChain(java.security.KeyStore aKeyStore,
                                               java.lang.String aKeyPassword)
                                                 throws TopLevelException
        Specified by:
        getPrivateKeyAndCertChain in interface PkiGeneric
        Returns:
        private key and certification chain corresponding to it, extracted from given keystore. The keystore is considered to have only one entry that contains both certification chain and its corresponding private key. If the keystore has no entries, an exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        TopLevelException

      • encodeX509CertChainToBase64

        public java.lang.String encodeX509CertChainToBase64(java.security.cert.Certificate[] aCertificationChain)
                                             throws TopLevelException
